text: Hand-signed copies of _Untitled and Unmastered_ LPs available for pre-order: <http://kendricklamar.shop.musictoday.com/product/5UKLCOMBO01>

attachments.title: untitled unmastered. Vinyl + Download
attachments.text: Welcome to the Kendrick Lamar Official Store! Shop Kendrick Lamar merchandise and pre-order the new album ‘untitled unmastered’ on CD or autographed vinyl.
